body:
So This is just a Suggestion.

So the next Avicus tournament is going to be played BO3 Single elimination by only 8 teams, So I think for making it better it should be the Quater, Semifinals and Finals on different weeks.

Thanks n.n!

title: [Suggestion] TM 2 Matches.

replies.body:
Hacer que un torneo dure 3 semanas generalmente hace que los equipos se aburran de esperar y no se presenten a las partidas, asi que no, no es buena idea hacerlo tan largo.

Un ejemplo? El torneo pasado.
